summary: The diff shows addition of a standalone HTML file (demo.html) with external font dependencies, violating the self-contained requirement. The file appears to have inline CSS and JavaScript (truncated), HTML5 structure, and feature sections for the Neroxa AI demo. However, Google Fonts links are present as external dependencies.

missing_requirements.requirement: All functionality works without external file dependencies
missing_requirements.reason: The demo.html file includes external Google Fonts dependencies via <link> tags to fonts.googleapis.com and fonts.gstatic.com, violating the self-contained requirement
